entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
